attributes.additional_details: Ryanair have said that they will be cancelling 50 flights upwards over the next few months leaving people stranded,holiday  plans in tatters ,family occasions ruined and people out of pocket. The goverment should be  looking at this company's track record and what they are doing to the public and questioning whether ryanair as a company are fit to hold a aviation license.
attributes.background: I am starting this petition after being stranded as a family of seven in spain for four days with no where to go and no money to do so.A look at their facebook/Twitter page will show our situation is not unique and thousands of people have been affected by this.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Irish Aviation Authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
